name: Wesley M
text: They were the only place really open by the hotel I was staying at and I was pretty hungry. I simply decided to order 8 wings. Just 8 wings. My order was placed at 11:40 PM and the delivery driver did not arrive until 12:52 AM. That is …More

name: Luis Ramos
text: Really bad service and the cheese wasn't even melted all the way. Wouldnt recommend.

name: Rosa M. Jimenez
text: Overall the pizza is warm and not too thin or thick. I like that you can personalize the pizza to your liking and they offer package deals and a free pizza once you get 25 points. So overall, a good place for quick pick-up pizza. Oh..the chicken poppers are tasty too.

name: wayne e
text: The guys at night are the coolest most laid back people. Very friendly and courteous. And of course the food is great. Best bet for a late night snack.

name: Nikhil Talwalkar
text: Papa John's not only provides deliciously crafted cheesy goodness, but opens up your mind to a new way of life. I was recently in a relationship with Papa, and you can really taste the heart and soul in his food. Hail Papa  John, the one and only true god.

name: BXBEAUTY
text: Worst establishment and customer service ever! I ordered a pizza and I opened the box to find half of the pizza squashed to one side! I called manager and he said he'll send over a fresh 1.. Guy comes back and has the audacity to …More

name: Andy Von Kennel
text: Only get delivery but love it.  Recommend using the app to create a thin crust, extra crispy with extra sauce - you pick toppings - so good!

name: Mike Moutopoulos
text:
Best Pizza in Stamford. Recently moved from NYC to Stamford, I thought all hope was lost.  Because you know NYC has the best pizza in the world.
Finally a place that makes a thick enough crust, not soggy, and ingredients tasted fresh.        Who would of thought a chain no less,. Thanks Papa John's.

name: Petčko P
text: Ok pizza, fresh veggies, and good costumer service. Great place to grab a bite when nothing else is open late. AG was nice helping me out as it was my first time here. Would of rated 3-4, but theyre open pretty late so its a plus

name: Robert Acquisto
text: Quite literally the worst Papa John's on the planet. Over an hour to deliver. Doesn't answer phone after order placed. Order came and was not right. Order came and did not seem like papa the usual papa John's but a buy at store frozen pizza. Just absolutely terrible.

name: Suzanne Rivera
text: The food always comes as ordered and it comes fast, hot and fresh. We have never had a problem with the food or service.

name: Jacqueline McGuigan
text: I place my order at 12:45 and didn't get it until after 230 in the afternoon.  They are only 2 miles from my house. I got no explanation other than there was only one  delivery person.  My pizza was cold.  When I called the store to check …More

name: vijay yadav
text: Taste is nice

name: Garfield Beckford
text: Make your mouth water when the pizza  come out of the oven.lol.

name: Ravi Shankar Ramachandran
text: Guys in the store are so rude and lack customer service. They even dont know how to redeem groupon vouchers. they lack training and basic manners

name: umme kulsum
text: Everything is clean.and pizza is so testy.

name: Suraj Songire
text: Pizza was good but employees were not. Very rude and total lack of interest.

name: Nicole
text: very friendly staff. ready to help you and get your food out to you right away.

name: Raj Roy
text: not good experience. they didn't accept the coupon code . disappointed

name: Marilynn Munsch
text: Terrible customer service!

name: Shalabh Saxena
text: Good service and great pizza

name: Thirumurugan Subramaniam
text: Nice pizza but poor delivery

name: Mohammed Shafi
text: Delicious pizzas, good customer service

name: Revanth Ganta
text: I had the worst experience at this store. Please make sure you order at lunch time if you need Pizza for Dinner. I got my delivery after 3 hours and I live 0.5 mile away from this location. Every time I make a follow up call they tried to …More

name: Natanael Gonzalez
text: Horrible management placed a complain via corporate they said the management then owners would never got a call back

name: Jill. Ofi
text: The workers here are rude and have bad attitudes.

name: Carlos Feliciano
text: Good costumer service and clean spot

name: Jeffrey Clynes
text: First time ever having Papa John's absolutely disgusting what a waste of money I would have rather have eaten the $25 paper money it would have definitely tasted much better

name: G. may
text: Very poor customer service, and they don't wash their hands nor wear gloves. I literally seen the worker come out the bathroom and get straight to the dough.
